This is a sample text file for testing FileVault encryption and decryption functionality.

FileVault Test Data
==================

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed do eiusmod tempor 
incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis 
nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Testing Features:
- Basic encryption/decryption
- File integrity verification  
- Error handling
- Cross-platform compatibility

Security Test Cases:
1. Password validation
2. Salt generation uniqueness
3. IV randomness verification
4. Authentication tag validation
5. Memory security (zeroization)

This file contains exactly 256 characters of meaningful test data to validate
the FileVault encryption system works correctly with various file sizes and
content types including special characters: !@#$%^&*()_+-={}[]|;:'"<>,.?/~`

End of test file.
